Master Answer:
You don't have mail your child's vaccine records. Instead, bring all of your child's vaccine records to your daughter's next vaccination appointment. At the Health Unit, they will make a photocopy of her vaccine records and enter it into her chart.
You can book a vaccination appointment with Fraser Health by calling 604-476-7087. Fraser Health call centre hours of operation: Monday to Friday (8:30 am -4:30 pm). Find the address of the health unit using our finder.
Immunization Nurse
